channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- BigFix Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- BigFix Platform

item.title: CVE-2017-1221|2024-09-17T03:02:31.456Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager (IBM BigFix 9.2 and 9.5) does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 123861.

item.title: CVE-2017-1231|2024-09-17T01:41:26.914Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.5 - 9.5.9 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 123910.

item.title: CVE-2018-1478|2024-09-17T04:19:00.445Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2.0 through 9.2.14 and 9.5 through 9.5.9 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 140760.

item.title: CVE-2018-1473|2024-09-17T00:42:30.418Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 140691.

item.title: CVE-2019-4061|2024-09-17T03:34:21.480Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 could allow an attacker to query the relay remotely and gather information about the updates and fixlets deployed to the associated sites due to not enabling authenticated access. IBM X-Force ID: 156869.

item.title: CVE-2018-1479|2024-09-17T00:30:32.344Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 140761.

item.title: CVE-2019-4011|2024-09-17T03:54:27.491Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155885.
